Review Name: Delightful Review Description: Just 15 days back, I got it from Flipkart. Prompt Delivery. Next Day Installation was there. Installation people were directly from Voltas. Good workmanship. Separately paid 1179 for installation. Since I purchased extra copper pipe and sleeve covers, they charged extra 250/MTR as labour charge. I am yet to find out the energy efficiency after a month usage . I will give more reviews on all parameters later. So far so good..
